abstract: Groupon has walked away from Google’s $6 billion takeover offer, according to a person close to Groupon. The rejection at least temporarily thwarts Google’s efforts to buy the social buying site.
snippet: Groupon has walked away from Google’s $6 billion takeover offer, according to a person close to Groupon. The rejection at least temporarily thwarts Google’s efforts to buy the social buying site.
lead_paragraph: 11:37 p.m. | Updated  Groupon has walked away from Google’s $6 billion takeover offer, according to a person close to Groupon. The rejection at least temporarily thwarts Google’s efforts to buy the social buying site, which would have been its largest acquisition to date.

headline.main: Groupon Said to Reject Google’s Offer

byline.original: By Evelyn M. Rusli and Jenna Wortham
